DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate bioequivalence losartan/hydrochlorothiazide ( HCTZ ) combination tablet coadministration losartan hydrochlorothiazide .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Losartan Hydrochlorothiazide ( HCTZ ) Combination Tablet Coadministration Its Components ( 0954A-306 )
